name: Coffee Rush (itch) (Garnet)
description:
COFFEE RUSH

This 2D Platformer follows the story of the Player just wanting to get his morning coffee! But Ben the Bean Bandit is having none of that - He steals his coffee beans and scatters them around a mysterious world that you must now traverse! 

There are multiple different levels that introduce the player to various mechanics throughout the game - Remember to hunt and collect all the coffee beans along the way!

Use full screen to prevent edges of level being cut off.

Controls:

WASD to move
Space to jump
Escape to pause
Space to respawn

Created by Jake, Riley, Hein & Gavin
